column4: hello, it's urgent, I need to access my windows server via Remote Desktop from my ubuntu desktop
plase
use the remote desktop application
it refuses

but it's viewing another windows pcs

is the windows machine blocking it, what remote desktop application are you using
windows remote desktop
no, what ubuntu application ar eyou using
how are you trying to connect from your ubuntu machine
what application on your ubuntu machine are you using
Application > Internet > Remote Desktop Viewer
what is the windows machine running, 2003 server ?
yes exactly
is your windows box connected now ?
sorry, is your windows client, connected to the windows server at the same time as te linux client ?

try installing the rdesktop client
